Comments_List: I greatly increased my knowledge of french literature and culture, and I also sharpened my writing and oral skills.

I found the small class environment conducive to learning and to language practice. Professor Thibaud made class time fun and feel casual and relaxed. I really appreciated that we read stories in the French language from around the world, and felt very proud of myself after finishing two full French novels by the end of the semester. I made friends in the class and enjoyed coming to class each morning.
It's a lot of work, but you do learn French pretty well. The grading isn't EASY but it's fair.
I thought this course was excellent. I wish there was less grammar and more group projects but it seems grammar is a necessary evil.
In the future, I'd suggest that quizzes be announced with a bit more prior notice, and that we practice listening and speaking skills more in class time and in homework to prepare for tests.
This course was excellentI'd highly recommend if interested in french!
I would recommend the class to another student because it was enjoyable, intensive, and focused.
